changeSet.author: vincit-miikkala
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE harvest_taxation_report ADD CONSTRAINT chk_young_percent CHECK (young_percent between 0 and 100);
ALTER TABLE harvest_taxation_report ADD CONSTRAINT chk_planned_utilization_rate_of_the_permits CHECK (planned_utilization_rate_of_the_permits between 0 and 100);
ALTER TABLE harvest_taxation_report ADD CONSTRAINT chk_share_of_banking_permits CHECK (share_of_banking_permits between 0 and 100);

changeSet.author: vincit-miikkala
vincit-miikkala

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(ra.*) FROM rhy_hta ra INNER JOIN organisation o ON ra.organisation_id = o.organisation_id INNER JOIN hta ON ra.hta_id = hta.gid WHERE o.name_finnish = 'Vaasan seudun riistanhoitoyhdistys' AND hta.nimi_ly = 'RP-PO 2';

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO rhy_hta (organisation_id, hta_id) SELECT o.organisation_id, hta.gid FROM organisation o, hta WHERE o.name_finnish = 'Vaasan seudun riistanhoitoyhdistys' AND hta.nimi_ly = 'RP-PO 2' ON CONFLICT (organisation_id, hta_id) DO NOTHING;

changeSet.author: vincit-miikkala
vincit-miikkala
vincit-nikooj
changeSet.comment: Since PG11 adding a new column with a default value is pretty much instant.

changeSet.author: vincit-miikkala
changeSet.sql: UPDATE file_metadata AS fm SET resource_url = CONCAT( SUBSTRING(fm.resource_url FROM '(.*)/[^/]*$'), '/taxationreportattachment/', SUBSTRING(fm.resource_url FROM '([^/]*)$') ) FROM harvest_taxation_report_attachment AS htra WHERE htra.attachment_metadata_id = fm.file_metadata_uuid;

changeSet.author: vincit-miikkala
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE harvest_taxation_report ADD CONSTRAINT unique_taxation_report_fields UNIQUE (rhy_id,hta_id,hunting_year,game_species_id);
